article.Heading: Union Budget 2016-17: Max Fin up 4%; govt proposes Rs 5500cr for crop insurance scheme
article.Summary: Shares of Max Financial Services gained 4 percent intraday as Finance Minister Arun Jaitley in his Union Budget 16-17 has recommended the launch new health care scheme with Rs 1 lakh as cover per family.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

Shares of Max Financial Services gained 4 percent intraday as Finance Minister Arun Jaitley in his Union Budget 16-17 has recommended the launch new health care scheme with Rs 1 lakh as cover per family.

The government has also proposed Rs 5,500 crore for crop insurance scheme for FY17.

At 15:15 hrs Max Financial Services was quoting at Rs 338.00, up Rs 10.80, or 3.30 percent.
